languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс прищуривается, оглядывая ксеноса.{/n} "Эта порода друкари зовется ведьмами, {name}. Эксперты по пусканию крови на аренах и поле боя. Но меня больше интересуют те, кто стоит в тени — судя по доспехам, это высокопоставленные представители кабала, военной клики из домена друкари. Кажется, мы угодили на мерзкое подобие представления для высоких гостей".

traits.locale_text: {n}Хейнрикс прищуривается, оглядывая ксеноса.{/n} "Эта порода друкари зовется ведьмами, {name}. Эксперты по пусканию крови на аренах и поле боя. Но меня больше интересуют те, кто стоит в тени — судя по доспехам, это высокопоставленные представители кабала, военной клики из домена друкари. Кажется, мы угодили на мерзкое подобие представления для высоких гостей".

languages.text: {n}Heinrix narrows his eyes and gives the xenos an appraising look.{/n} "The Drukhari of this breed are known as Wyches, {name}. They are experts at bloodletting in the arenas and on the battlefield. However, I am more interested in the ones skulking in shadows — judging by their armour, they are high-ranking representatives of a Kabal, a military clique from the Drukhari demesne. It seems we have disrupted a vile performance for their distinguished guests."
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс прищуривается, оглядывая ксеноса.{/n} "Эта порода друкари зовется ведьмами, {name}. Эксперты по пусканию крови на аренах и поле боя. Но меня больше интересуют те, кто стоит в тени — судя по доспехам, это высокопоставленные представители кабала, военной клики из домена друкари. Кажется, мы угодили на мерзкое подобие представления для высоких гостей".

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix squints and gives the xeno an appraising look.{/n} "This Drukhari breed is called the witches, {name}. They are experts at bloodletting in the arenas and on the battlefield. However, I am more interested in the ones skulking in shadows — judging by their armour, they are high-ranking representatives of a kabal, a military clique from the Drukhari demesne. It looks like we have disrupted a vile performance for the distinguished guests."

It looks like we have disrupted a vile performance for the distinguished guests."

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスは目を細め、異種族を鑑定するような眼差しを送る。{/n}「{name}よ、この種のデュカーリはウィッチとして知られている。奴らはアリーナや戦場を血に染める専門家だ。しかし、俺は影にひそむ者たちの方に興味がある。奴らのアーマーから判断すると、それはデュカーリ領域からの軍事的な一派、陰謀団の高官のようだ。奴らの賓客のための下劣なパフォーマンスを妨害してしまったようだな」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix narrows his eyes and gives the xenos an appraising look.{/n} "The Drukhari of this breed are known as Wyches, {name}. They are experts at bloodletting in the arenas and on the battlefield. However, I am more interested in the ones skulking in shadows — judging by their armour, they are high-ranking representatives of a Kabal, a military clique from the Drukhari demesne. It seems we have disrupted a vile performance for their distinguished guests."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスは目を細め、異種族を鑑定するような眼差しを送る。{/n}「{name}よ、この種のデュカーリはウィッチとして知られている。奴らはアリーナや戦場を血に染める専門家だ。しかし、俺は影にひそむ者たちの方に興味がある。奴らのアーマーから判断すると、それはデュカーリ領域からの軍事的な一派、陰謀団の高官のようだ。奴らの賓客のための下劣なパフォーマンスを妨害してしまったようだな」

languages.text: {n}Heinrix plisse les yeux et jauge le xénos du regard.{/n} « Les Drukharis de cette race sont appelés "Cérastes", {name}. Ce sont des experts du champ de bataille et de l'arène. Mais je m'intéresse davantage à ceux qui sont tapis dans l'ombre : à en juger par leurs armures, il s'agit de hauts dignitaires de la Kabale, une faction militaire drukhari. Il semblerait que nous ayons interrompu une ignoble mise en scène organisée en l'honneur de leurs invités d'exception. »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix narrows his eyes and gives the xenos an appraising look.{/n} "The Drukhari of this breed are known as Wyches, {name}. They are experts at bloodletting in the arenas and on the battlefield. However, I am more interested in the ones skulking in shadows — judging by their armour, they are high-ranking representatives of a Kabal, a military clique from the Drukhari demesne. It seems we have disrupted a vile performance for their distinguished guests."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix plisse les yeux et jauge le xénos du regard.{/n} « Les Drukhari de cette race sont appelés "Cérastes", {name}. Ce sont des experts du champ de bataille et de l'arène. Mais je m'intéresse davantage à ceux qui sont tapis dans l'ombre : à en juger par leurs armures, il s'agit de hauts dignitaires de la Kabale, une faction militaire drukhari. Il semblerait que nous ayons interrompu une ignoble mise en scène organisée en l'honneur de leurs invités d'exception. »

languages.text: {n}海因里希眯着眼睛，打量着眼前的异形。{/n}“这种黑暗灵族被称为‘巫灵’，{name}，她们是竞技场与战场上的放血专家。不过，更让我感兴趣的，是躲在暗处的那些人。从他们的盔甲来看，他们是阴谋团的高阶代表。阴谋团是黑暗灵族之中的军事集团。看来，她们这场邪恶的表演本来是献给贵宾的，但我们却打乱了她们的安排。”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix narrows his eyes and gives the xenos an appraising look.{/n} "The Drukhari of this breed are known as Wyches, {name}. They are experts at bloodletting in the arenas and on the battlefield. However, I am more interested in the ones skulking in shadows — judging by their armour, they are high-ranking representatives of a Kabal, a military clique from the Drukhari demesne. It seems we have disrupted a vile performance for their distinguished guests."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希眯着眼睛，打量着眼前的异形。{/n}“这种黑暗灵族被称为‘巫灵’，{name}，她们是竞技场与战场上的放血专家。不过，更让我感兴趣的，是躲在暗处的那些人。从他们的盔甲来看，他们是阴谋团的高阶代表。阴谋团是黑暗灵族之中的军事集团。看来，她们这场邪恶的表演本来是献给贵宾的，但我们却打乱了她们的安排。”

languages.text: {n}Heinrix entrecierra los ojos y mira a la xenos con detenimiento.{/n} «Las Drukhari de esta raza son conocidas como Brujas, {name}. Son expertas en derramar sangre en arenas y en campos de batalla. Sin embargo, me interesan más las que se esconden en las sombras: a juzgar por su armadura, son representantes de alto rango de una kábala, una agrupación militar de las tierras Drukhari. Parece que hemos interrumpido un vil espectáculo para sus distinguidos invitados».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix narrows his eyes and gives the xenos an appraising look.{/n} "The Drukhari of this breed are known as Wyches, {name}. They are experts at bloodletting in the arenas and on the battlefield. However, I am more interested in the ones skulking in shadows — judging by their armour, they are high-ranking representatives of a Kabal, a military clique from the Drukhari demesne. It seems we have disrupted a vile performance for their distinguished guests."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix entrecierra los ojos y mira a la xenos con detenimiento.{/n} «Las Drukhari de esta raza son conocidas como Brujas, {name}. Son expertas en derramar sangre en arenas y en campos de batalla. Sin embargo, me interesan más las que se esconden en las sombras: a juzgar por su armadura, son representantes de alto rango de una kábala, una agrupación militar de las tierras Drukhari. Parece que hemos interrumpido un vil espectáculo para sus distinguidos invitados».

languages.text: {n}Heinrix kneift die Augen zusammen und mustert den Xenos prüfend.{/n} "Man nennt diese Drukhari auch Hekatari, {name}. Sie sind Experten im Blutvergießen, sowohl in der Arena als auch auf dem Schlachtfeld. Mich interessieren aber eher die, die in den Schatten lauern. Ihrer Rüstung nach zu urteilen sind sie hochrangige Vertreter einer Kabale, einer Militärclique aus dem Territorium der Drukhari. Wir haben offenbar eine schändliche Darbietung für ihre Ehrengäste unterbrochen."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix narrows his eyes and gives the xenos an appraising look.{/n} "The Drukhari of this breed are known as Wyches, {name}. They are experts at bloodletting in the arenas and on the battlefield. However, I am more interested in the ones skulking in shadows — judging by their armour, they are high-ranking representatives of a Kabal, a military clique from the Drukhari demesne. It seems we have disrupted a vile performance for their distinguished guests."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix kneift die Augen zusammen und mustert den Xenos prüfend.{/n} "Man nennt diese Drukhari auch Hekatari, {name}. Sie sind Experten im Blutvergießen, sowohl in der Arena als auch auf dem Schlachtfeld. Mich interessieren aber eher die, die in den Schatten lauern. Ihrer Rüstung nach zu urteilen sind sie hochrangige Vertreter einer Kabale, einer Militärclique aus dem Territorium der Drukhari. Wir haben offenbar eine schändliche Darbietung für ihre Ehrengäste unterbrochen."

languages.text: {n}Heinrix, gözlerini kısarak zenoyu süzercesine bakıyor.{/n} "Bu türün Drukhari olanlarına Viç denir {name}. Hem arenalarda hem de çatışma alanlarında kan dökmekte üstlerine yoktur. Gölgelerde pusuya yatanları ise benim daha çok ilgimi çekiyor. Zırhlarına bakarsak Drukhari'nin askerî bir hizbi olan bir Kabal'ın yüksek rütbeli temsilcileri olsalar gerek. Seçkin konukları için düzenledikleri aşağılık bir gösteriyi sekteye uğratmış olmalıyız."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix narrows his eyes and gives the xenos an appraising look.{/n} "The Drukhari of this breed are known as Wyches, {name}. They are experts at bloodletting in the arenas and on the battlefield. However, I am more interested in the ones skulking in shadows — judging by their armour, they are high-ranking representatives of a Kabal, a military clique from the Drukhari demesne. It seems we have disrupted a vile performance for their distinguished guests."

Zırhlarına bakarsak Drukhari'nin askerî bir hizbi olan bir Kabal'ın yüksek rütbeli temsilcileri olsalar gerek.
